meanings.definition: A large plate or platter, typically used for serving food.
meanings.sent1: The hostess carried the ashet piled high with delicious roast chicken.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served the pasta on a beautiful ashet.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to nap on the ashet, thinking it was a cozy bed.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as wide as an ashet when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The ashet gleamed under the bright lights, showcasing the chef's masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To place or serve food on a large plate or platter.
meanings.sent1: She carefully asheted the colorful fruits for the party.
meanings.sent2: The chef asheted the sushi rolls with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly asheted the cookies in a tower, pretending they were a castle.
meanings.sent4: The sun asheted the landscape with golden hues as it set.
meanings.sent5: The waiter asheted the steaming hot soup in front of the hungry customer.
